action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active
Heath Maguire changed the customer to Una Mapes

full_threads.body:
Hi Una,

Much better - thank you!

Confirming we have now done this for you. Note the profile is still in Draft status.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


On 10 Jun 2020, at 1:24 am, Una Mapes <una@veldhoencompany.com> wrote:

﻿Hi Heath

Robbie has found another shot which is much bigger in terms of filesize... could you use this to crop so its above shoulders? And amend the background for us?

Cheers! ☺

Una Mapes
Marketing Director
<image001.png>
Veldhoen + Company PTY Ltd
+44 7378 526062 | una@veldhoencompany.com
London | www.veldhoencompany.com

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Tuesday, 9 June 2020 at 4:22 am
To: Una McGeehan <una@veldhoencompany.com>
Subject: Re: Profile

Hi Una,

Happy to help out with this one… the photo however is about half the size of what we need. It would be very grainy… Any chance we could get a bigger version?

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271



On 8 Jun 2020, at 11:03 pm, Una Mapes <una@veldhoencompany.com> wrote:

Hi Heath
Could you help us with adding Robbie's photo to his profile?
We aren't able to edit the background here... I've created his page as draft on the English site
https://www.veldhoencompany.com/wp-admin/post.php?post=7845&action=edit&lang=en
Thank-you!! ☺
Una
Una Mapes
Marketing Director

From: Robbie Yu <Robbie@veldhoencompany.com>
Date: Thursday, 4 June 2020 at 3:44 pm
To: Robbie Yu <Robbie@veldhoencompany.com>, Una McGeehan <una@veldhoencompany.com>
Subject: Re: Profile
This is the only professional headshot I have for now. Didn't manage to change the background.
Does this work?
Robbie Yu
Business analyst
+1 949-536-4684

<image005.png>
Veldhoen + Company Inc. 
200 Broadway, 3rd Floor
New York, NY 10038
United States
www.veldhoencompany.com
From: Robbie Yu <Robbie@veldhoencompany.com>
Date: Thursday, June 4, 2020 at 10:21 AM
To: Robbie Yu <Robbie@veldhoencompany.com>, Una Mapes <una@veldhoencompany.com>
Subject: Re: Profile
Hi Una,
Here is my blurb for the website:
Tagline: Change appears to be difficult, until we learn a little bit more
Bio: Robbie is a Workstyle Analyst with a background in Industrial/Organizational Psychology. His interest lies in solving organizational problems with a human-centric, data-driven approach, changing the 'Change' by studying and engaging people on their journey to a new way of working.
Phone: +1 949-536-4684
Let me know if they work and anything else you need from me.
Thanks!
Robbie Yu
Business analyst
+1 949-536-4684

<image006.png>
Veldhoen + Company Inc. 
200 Broadway, 3rd Floor
New York, NY 10038
United States
www.veldhoencompany.com
From: Robbie Yu <Robbie@veldhoencompany.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 2, 2020 at 6:53 PM
To: Una Mapes <una@veldhoencompany.com>
Subject: Re: Profile
Hi Una,
Sorry for the delay in response. I'm just back from my interim break and will send you the photo and bio by the end of this week. Does that work?
Due to the circumstances here in the States, I don't have the opportunity to get a headshot done. So I'll probably dig up some old headshots and figure out if I can change the background or format.
Let me know if you need anything else from me.
Stay safe and healthy!
Robbie
Get Outlook for iOS
From: Una Mapes <una@veldhoencompany.com>
Sent: Friday, May 15, 2020 2:36:55 PM
To: Robbie Yu <Robbie@veldhoencompany.com>
Subject: Profile
Hi Robbie
We're linking the authors to our website, and I noticed we don't have you on our website!
Is there any chance we could get a photo of you, and a blurb to add to the site?
It's not urgent as it will link from the white paper, but if you could get something over to me within a few weeks that would be great
Cheers
Una
Una Mapes
Marketing Director
